channel.title: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape
channel.description: I cleared MSCP from my history as a whole, and all it's cookies, but it's still loading https...

item.title: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Well this seemed to helped on my site so will post what I did on there:

-On the chrome adblock plus extension there is a whitelist. I just simply added http and https moparscape to the whitelist and it seems to be just fine. It does make it so it shows ads but meh.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:31, topic:436819”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=539533.msg3951716#msg3951716 date=1332348943]
What versions of chrome are you guys running?
[/quote]
I’m running latest, just checked, Chrome 17.0.963.79.[/quote]
Saying that though, I haven’t had it in about 3 days or more. When I reported the error in the staff sections about 2 weeks ago, I was literally getting it every time I refreshed, that lasted 2 days. It went away a little after that but still appeared occasionally.

item.title: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:27, topic:436819”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539533.msg3951678#msg3951678 date=1332346124]

You post and hope to god it leaves the post you want when you click away from the page(it doesn’t refresh and say your message just loads for ages for me).

Wait are you talking about when you press post and it never loads? And then you refresh the page and gives you like a message stating that the title/body was blank? That’s what happens to me occasionally.

Yeah, worst when it happens in pm cause you can’t click back (chrome saves what I type in the box so i just click back when its a post on a thread etc).
[/quote]

Is there a particular reason why the browser doesn’t prompt you to resend the page data?

It usually does that (like on my own forums).[/quote]
Not sure, the post box is different on these forums though. If you really wanna know I think if you checked the source code for the page it may provide some answers to why or ask mitb ;p.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape

item.title: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:26, topic:436819”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=539533.msg3951673#msg3951673 date=1332345834]

You post and hope to god it leaves the post you want when you click away from the page(it doesn’t refresh and say your message just loads for ages for me).

Wait are you talking about when you press post and it never loads? And then you refresh the page and gives you like a message stating that the title/body was blank? That’s what happens to me occasionally.
[/quote]
Yeah, worst when it happens in pm cause you can’t click back (chrome saves what I type in the box so i just click back when its a post on a thread etc).[/quote]

Is there a particular reason why the browser doesn’t prompt you to resend the page data?

It usually does that (like on my own forums).

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:22, topic:436819”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=539533.msg3950881#msg3950881 date=1332274934]

It never stopped me from being able to post though?

If you post, it will just keep loading and loading, and then I usually just refresh the page to see if my post actually went through. Half the time it doesn’t.
[/quote]
Can confirm I get this too. Normally only if I spend like more than a minute on that page though, if I post within a minute it tends to post and load normally.[/quote]
Never tried that, I read a lot before I think over my reply.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get it to stop loading https://moparscape

[/quote]
If you post, it will just keep loading and loading, and then I usually just refresh the page to see if my post actually went through. Half the time it doesn’t.[/quote]
